about_the_game:
slime feet is a linear visual novel. there are no choices. you can not change the outcome. you can only watch.

slime feet is about an in-depth exploration and reflection on long distance relationships, disability and illness. slime feet is about finding a sense of intimacy and lesbian sexual connection even in front of the macabre. slime feet is about how foot fetish prevails even when your favorite feet are turning into slime.

SYNOPSIS

In the sub-zero temperatures of the Arctic stands The Amoninsula Research Facility, a bunker housing the world's top scientists dedicated to studying and containing “Hazards”, anomalies which defy the laws of physics, as well as common sense.

After a streak of unlucky incidents, Estelle Mcclendon finds herself in an encounter with a Hazard, becoming a “Host” for “Miasma”, an amorphous floating cloud that seeks to subsume living organisms. Miasma will gradually spread through the body, deteriorating bone and tissues alike until the weakened internal organs can no longer sustain the human functions necessary for life.

With no known cure for a Host infected by Miasma, Estelle spends the remainder of her days exchanging messages with her closest coworker, Abbi. Together, they do their best to feel intimacy by being perverts together while staring the looming, macabre regression toward death straight in the eye.

slime feet is about sloppy messy lesbian cybersex

slime feet is about 'faggot' getting thrown around like candy

slime feet is about you knowing i love you

content_descriptors.notes: slime feet is a game for adult audiences only. This work contains intense themes of psychological and body horror, a slow drawn out death from a terminal illness, prominent explicit cybersex, and liberal usage of slurs in a sexual context.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Additional Notes: Best played at 1920x1080 or bigger resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Additional Notes: Best played at 1920x1080 or bigger resolution

name: slime feet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: Best played at 1920x1080 or bigger resolution

reviews:
“slime feet is about love. slime feet is about loving through the screen. slime feet is about barriers dissolving behind barriers. slime feet is about jerking off to your love. slime feet is about jerking off to your love for as long as you're able. slime feet is very good”
10/10 – isa
short_description: slime feet is a linear visual novel, a love story for everyone who has ever had to love through a keyboard. slime feet is about the body horror of an inevitable drawn out death, and the lesbian slime feet cybersex that comes with it.
